text: Brookmerland is a Samtgemeinde ("collective municipality") in Aurich, in Lower Saxony, Germany. It is southeast of Norden. Its seat is in the village Marienhafe. The Samtgemeinde Brookmerland has the following municipalities: # Leezdorf # Marienhafe # Osteel # Rechtsupweg # Upgant-Schott # Wirdum Category:Samtgemeinden in Lower Saxony Category:Towns and villages in East Frisia
title: Brookmerland
